targets.expr:
(
  sum by (namespace,pod,container) (rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace="$namespace",pod=~".*controller.*",container="manager"}[5m])) 
  / on(namespace,pod,container) 
  group_left sum by (namespace,pod,container) (kube_pod_container_resource_limits{resource="cpu",namespace="$namespace",pod=~".*controller.*",})
) * 100
